metadata.description: Anna never suspected that werewolves exist, till the night she became one herself! A rare Omega wolf, for three long years she's kept her head down at the bottom of the pack, learning to trust no one. Now, Anna's caught the eye of a powerful Alpha wolf, who recognizes her true value as a member of the pack. What will happen when Alpha and Omega come together? Cry Wolf is the latest series of supernatural adventure by New York Times best selling fantasy author Patricia Briggs. Set in the same world as her popular Mercy Thompson novels, it's sure to be a hit with fans old and new!
metadata.name: Patricia Briggs' Alpha & Omega: Cry Wolf
